eu.monnetproject.bliss

Interface NGramSimilarityMetric

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NGramSalience

    public interface NGramSimilarityMetric
    A similarity metric that uses n-grams
    Author:
    John McCrae

      The dimensionality of the semantic space of this metric

    • Method Detail

      • simVecSource

        Vector<Double> simVecSource(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2IntMap<NGram> ngramFreqs)
        Calculate the vector for the source language
        Parameters:
        ngramFreqs - A map of ngrams to their frequencies (it can be assumed missing n-grams have frequency 0)
        Returns:
        A vector representation of the document in some semantic space

      • simVecTarget

        Vector<Double> simVecTarget(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2IntMap<NGram> ngramFreqs)
        Calculate the vector for the target language
        Parameters:
        ngramFreqs - A map of ngrams to their frequencies (it can be assumed missing n-grams have frequency 0)
        Returns:
        A vector representation of the document in some semantic space

        The maximum token index supported by this metric
